refnamediv.refpurpose: An SQL statement that generates a rowset for v:data-source.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A container for SQL statement generating a rowset or table name (see data-source).

formalpara.title: language = SqlName
formalpara.para: Denotes the type of language, currently only SQL expressions are supported, see 'expression-type' attribute of the data-source control.

formalpara.title: debug-srcfile
formalpara.para: URI of the source document where the tag comes from.

formalpara.title: debug-srcline
formalpara.para: Line number in the source document where the tag comes from.

formalpara.title: debug-log
formalpara.para: This defines what sort of data are saved to the debugging log.
